name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior DevOps Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I possess advanced skills in **AWS**, **CI/CD**, **Python**, **Git**, **Jenkins**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**. I excel at developing automated deployment pipelines and managing infrastructure-as-code to enhance operational efficiency. My proficiency in **Ansible**, **CloudFormation**, and configuration management tools like **Chef** and **Puppet** enables me to optimize system performance across diverse environments. I have a solid background in databases including **Oracle**, **MySQL**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring data integrity and reliability. I am skilled in **microservices** architecture and am adept at troubleshooting and supporting open-source technologies. My unique strengths—innovation, flexibility, adaptability, and strong communication—allow me to effectively collaborate within cross-functional teams to drive successful project outcomes in e-commerce, financial, and healthcare domains.

Managed containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated services with **Kubernetes**, improving scalability and operational efficiency of distributed systems.
Implemented monitoring and observability solutions with **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, enabling proactive system health checks and performance tracking for production environments.
Defined and enforced DevOps best practices, adopting Agile methodologies and fostering collaboration across cross-functional teams to drive project success.

Optimized database interactions with **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, applying advanced querying techniques and performance tuning measures for data-intensive applications.
Facilitated code reviews and mentoring sessions, strengthening technical skills and communication within the team of over **10** engineers, resulting in enhanced productivity.
Utilized configuration management tools such as **Chef** and **Ansible** for seamless deployment and maintenance of development, testing, and production environments.
Maintained Linux-based systems (**Ubuntu**, **CentOS**, and **RedHat**) for hosting application infrastructure, ensuring optimal security and performance measures are consistently applied.
Developed customized scripts and automation solutions to alleviate operational tasks, enhancing flexibility and adaptability within the team while streamlining workflows.

- Designed and optimized CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **Jenkins**, and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring consistent and reliable delivery of features and improving deployment frequency by **30%**.
